title: Could you please inform me whether an intra-college transfer is available at PES University?
content: Namskara elarigu. I will be joining E-City campus this year. However, since I currently reside near Girinagar, I would prefer to join the RR campus for a more convenient commute. Please help maadiðŸ™ðŸ¿

comments.body: Not any significant difference between the campuses, but don't underestimate the travel time. You can shift campuses if you get a decent cgpa at the end of the first year. Or like the rest of us wait a few decades for the metro
isnt yellow line near ec campus scheduled to start in july or something?
It was scheduled to start 2 years ago. Yet here we are.

bro i see the metro testing everyday from my classroom ): 

 ts pmo
45D --> 410FA --> 600F vice-versa is your only option for now
are you from avalahalli or srinagara???
The thing is the line is completed but there are no trains to run lmao
